actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8e of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1953, as reenacted and amended by the Agriculture Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to domestic tomatoes.

summary.text: Subjects, under the Agriculture Adjustment Act, containers of imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to containers of domestic tomatoes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8e of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1953, as reenacted and amended by the Agriculture Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to domestic tomatoes.
